sn46.44:1.1: Then a mendicant went up to the Buddha … and asked him,
sn46.44:1.3: How is a witless idiot defined?”
sn46.44:1.4: “Mendicant, they’re called a witless idiot because they haven’t developed and cultivated the seven awakening factors.
sn46.44:1.6: The awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.
sn46.44:1.7: They’re called a witless idiot because they haven’t developed and cultivated these seven awakening factors.”
